scripts.pushTags: git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version major && yarn pushTags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m "updated CHANGELOG.md" && npm version minor && yarn pushTags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p -u https://github.com/MrCrazyBelka/generate-changelog -t "v$npm_package_version" && npm version patch && yarn pushTags
scripts.version: yarn build && git add --force build/ && git add CHANGELOG.md
scripts.postversion: commit_message=$(git log -1 --format=%B) && git reset --soft HEAD~1 && git reset lib/ && git commit -m $commit_message
